alert.note: Alert for Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 13 at 2:34PM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph. Gusts up to near 50 mph expected especially in the evening. Strongest wind gusts to around 55 mph Tuesday night around Sierra Vista. * WHERE...Upper San Pedro River Valley. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
